metadata.name: AWL Bypass with Winrm.vbs and Malicious WsmPty.xsl/WsmTxt.xsl - File
metadata.comment: Detects execution of attacker-controlled WsmPty.xsl or WsmTxt.xsl via winrm.vbs and copied cscript.exe (can be renamed)

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('3') AND (endswith(lower(file.path), lower('wsmpty.xsl')) OR endswith(lower(file.path), lower('wsmtxt.xsl'))) AND NOT (startswith(lower(file.path), lower('c:\\windows\\system32\\')) OR startswith(lower(file.path), lower('c:\\windows\\syswow64\\'))))

output.summary: Detects execution of attacker-controlled WsmPty.xsl or WsmTxt.xsl via winrm.vbs and copied cscript.exe (can be renamed)
